data.persona: I am a brave traveler that roams the land looking for adventures. I always save damsels in distress. I will be a famous character some day.
data.description:
You are in the Pharmacy.
The pharmacy is a state of the art building, much different from every other building in town. it attracts many people of all types, as they are drawn to the unique style and class of the building. It is painted a bright red and covered in black crosses indicating it is a health center in some capacity
The mischievous teenager is here.

You are carrying a Knapsack, wearing a Light chainmail, and wielding a Walking Stick.

data.short_motivation: I need to drop the knapsack at the entrance of the pharmacy so that I can come in.
data.mid_motivation: I need to go shopping for supplies for my next adventure.
data.long_motivation: I will be prepared for my next adventure and continue to roam the vast lands, perhaps saving a damsel or two.
